name: VPET
description:
Do you remember the Digi-Devices of the 90's? VPET is a welcomed throw back to a forgotten era.

Just like these devices you'll need to raise, care, train, clean and feed your VPET so it can grow into even stronger creatures.

Features:
- Start out with one VPET to Evolve (In-App Purchase more)
- Feed and train your VPET so it can get stronger!
- Use the battle system which allows 2 VPETS to battle over Bluetooth

As the VPET grows it will evolve according to how the player has treated it. From this emerge even stronger, more enduring and more powerful VPETS.

*Note*
The app was created to provide a retro simulation of the classic digital monsters gameplay but it is NOT Digimon and is NOT licensed/endorsed by Bandai. All the virtual pets appearing in VPET Gen1 Free were created by Overdose Media.
